text:
@realDonaldTrump @realDonaldTrump 
I can't believe you called the coronavirus the 'Chinese virus'.  Yet another example of your ignorance. You spend more time tweeting jaw dropping garbage than anything else. Why don't you  withdraw from re-election and get your hair fixed.

Love,
The Trumpy Bear

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
